short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lost time is never found again. - Benjamin Franklin

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your time is valuable. Get accountability for your mindless browsing habits in 2 easy steps.

1. ⌚Set a daily limit on distracting websites
2. 💵 Set a cost for passing your daily limits

🧠 Focussed browsing
Worth will ask you to commit to a specified time block before letting you through to the website. No more binging videos!

💲Stay accountable
If you pass your daily limits, you'll be locked out of the site and Worth will ask you to pay a penalty if you don’t adhere to your daily limits.

👁️ Track time wasted
Worth will track how often you adhere to daily limits + how much time you spend on distracting websites. 

Start adding some real accountability to your browser today!

~ Built with 💕 by a real human @ https://jfan.dev
